page.title: 14T.V. VIEWING IN HORNSEA.
page.content:
A survey was conducted of the favourite television programmes watched by children in the 7 to 11 age range at Hornsea Primary School.The replies were eventually divided into six categories. These were:-
a) children's T.V./cartoons b) American series c) English series d) comedy e) sport f) no favourite programme
American programmes such as "Street Hawk" and "Airwolf" were the most popular programmes especially for 9 to 10 year olds. Sport programmes were unpopular with all children.Comedy programmes only appeared to be enjoyed by the older primary children. DAVID ADDEY 5.G.
